TCName.name: SalesColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no
TCName.ActualSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.VarSales: select pln.ar_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_SLS_WTSG - pln.PLN_SLS_WTSG),0) as VAR_SLS_WTD_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no) pln, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no
TCName.VarSalesTotal: select pln.zone_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG - pln.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG),0) as VAR_SLS_WTD_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and TCName.LYSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.LYSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.LYSalesPct: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((cyly_wtd.cy_wtd / cyly_wtd.ly_wtd)-1)*100,2) END as ACTL_LY_PCT_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select cy_val.ar_no,sum(cy_val.ACTL_SLS_WTSG) as cy_wtd,sum(ly_val.ACTL_SLS_WTSG) as ly_wtd from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) cy_val LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) ly_val on cy_val.ar_no=ly_val.ar_no group by cy_val.ar_no) cyly_wtd on cyly_wtd.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.LYSalesPctTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((cyly_wtd.cy_wtd / cyly_wtd.ly_wtd)-1)*100,2) END as ACTL_LY_PCT_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select cy_val.zone_no,sum(cy_val.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG) as cy_wtd,sum(ly_val.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG) as ly_wtd from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) as b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(bdgt.FCST_SALES_TOT_WTSG,0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_TOT_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) fcst where fcst.zone_no=actl.zone_no
TCName.AvgBasketSales: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG = 0 AND nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 WHEN nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG),2),0) END as AVG_BASKET_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) nume_den on nume_den.ar_no=lc.ar_no
TCName.AvgBasketSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG = 0 AND nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG = 0 THEN 100 WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 WHEN nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG = 0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG),2),0) END as AVG_BASKET_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) nume_den on nume_den.zone_no=lc.zone_no
TCName.WkyMixSales: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) = 0 AND NVL(nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100,2) END as WKY_MIX_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select nume.ar_no,nume.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) nume, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) den ) nume_den on nume_den.ar_no=lc.ar_no
TCName.WkyMixSalesTotal: select nume_den.zone_no, CASE WHEN nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100,2) END as WKY_MIX_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) nume_den

TCName.name: ItemsColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedItems: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(itm.PLN_ITM_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_ITM_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS) as PLN_ITM_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) itm on lc.ar_no=itm.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedItemsTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(itm.PLN_ITM_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls_itm on lc.zone_no=sls_itm.zone_no
TCName.ActualItemPrice: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0)=0 AND NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_WTSG / sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_WTSG),2),0) END as ACTL_ITMPRZ_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG,sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS) as ACTL_ITM_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 and a.actl_itm_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_itm_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls_itm on lc.ar_no=sls_itm.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualItemPriceTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 AND NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG / sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_WTSG),2),0) END as ACTL_ITMPRZ_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_WTSG,sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 and a.actl_itm_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_itm_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls_itm on lc.zone_no=sls_itm.zone_no order by lc.zone_no

TCName.name: CustomersColumnValidation
TCName.ThisYrActlCustomers: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(itm.ACTL_CUST_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) itm on lc.ar_no=itm.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ThisYrActlCustomersTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(itm.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) itm on lc.zone_no=itm.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PctLastYrCustomers: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) cy_val LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_CUST_WTSG,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) ly_val on cy_val.ar_no=ly_val.ar_no group by cy_val.ar_no) cyly_wtd on cyly_wtd.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no

cy_val.zone_no ) cyly_wtd on cyly_wtd.zone_no=lc.zone_no
TCName.DataPenetrationCustomers: select nume_den.ar_no, CASE When nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG=0 and nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 When nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG=0 Then 0 when nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_CUST_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG)*100,2) END as DATA_PEN_CUST_WTSG from (select nume.ar_no,NVL(nume.ACTL_CUST_WTSG,0) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG,NVL(den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG,0) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,itm.ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) itm on lc.ar_no=itm.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) nume, (select lc.zone_no,itm.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) itm on lc.zone_no=itm.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) den order by nume.ar_no) nume_den
TCName.DataPenetrationCustomersTotal: select nume_den.zone_no, CASE When nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG)*100,2) END as DATA_PEN_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(itm.ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG,0) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_TOT_WTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (85,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) itm on lc.zone_no=itm.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) nume_den

TCName.name: HoursColumnValidation
TCName.ActualHours: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedHours: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,2),0) as PLN_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,2),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.VarHours: select pln.ar_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_HRS_WTSG - pln.PLN_HRS_WTSG),2) as VAR_HRS_WTSG from (select z.ar_no,NVL(y.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no) pln, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no
TCName.VarHoursTotal: select pln.zone_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG - pln.PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG),2) as VAR_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(hrs.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no
TCName.ActualSMS: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSG,2),0) as ACTL_SMS_WTSZ from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select * from (select ar_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select distinct src.*, (CASE /*when dept_no in (5,10,15) Then NVL(((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs),0)*/ when dept_no in (91,10,30,45,5,27,28,85,90,0) Then NVL(((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs),0) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case /*When LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) */ when dept_no in (91,10,30,45,5,27,28,85,90,0) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualSMSTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSG),2),0) as ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSZ from (select distinct zone_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no,ar_no order by zone_no,ar_no) xy on TCName.ORPercentage: select actl_sms.ar_no, case when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTSZ,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTSZ / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTSZ)*100,2),0) end as ACTL_OR_WTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSG,0) as ACTL_SMS_WTSZ from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select * from (select ar_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select distinct src.*, (CASE /*when dept_no in (5,10,15) Then NVL(((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs),0)*/ when dept_no in (91,10,30,45,5,27,28,85,90,0) Then NVL(((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs),0) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case /*When LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) */ when dept_no in (91,10,30,45,5,27,28,85,90,0) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_sms, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_hrs where actl_hrs.ar_no=actl_sms.ar_no order by actl_sms.ar_no

, w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no,ar_no order by zone_no,ar_no) xy on
